Welcome to Melusine's documentation !
=====================================

.. image:: ./_static/melusine.png
  :align: center
  :scale: 50%

This package aims to be the reference in the processing and modelization of French email data.
The project has been developed by MAIF.

+----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------+
| Company                                | GitHub Account                                           | Website                                                  |

| .. image:: ./_static/logoMAIFnew.png   | `MAIF GitHub <https://github.com/MAIF>`_                 | `MAIF <https://www.maif.fr/>`_                           |
|   :align: center                       |                                                          |                                                          |
|   :scale: 60%                          |                                                          |                                                          |
+----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------+
